name: UIPageControl.BackgroundStyle
desc: Constants that define the background styles of the page control.

items.name: case automatic
items.desc: The default background style, which adapts in response to changes in the page controlâ€™s interaction state.

items.name: case prominent
items.desc: The background style that shows a full background regardless of the interaction.

items.name: case minimal
items.desc: The background style that shows a minimal background regardless of the interaction.
